author: thorsten
msg: wildcard matcher such as **.xml when used in lm actions like {1} are not rewritten
Thanks to David that suggested to use {../1} instead. The problem occur in the lm when you have
The param needs to look into the parent (act) for {1}. So changing to {../1} returns the correct value.
